name: Brass (itch)
description:
Story:

The year in 1962 and the US government has noticed Soviet SAM sites have been set up in Cuba. Fearing possible ICBM close to US soil, you are sent in a U2 spy plane as part of Operation Brass Knob in order to gather information on the Missile sites.

Fly over the Cuban countryside, Avoid Radar and SAMs, Survey the Missile Sites, and return home safely.

Created for the Historically Accurate Game Jam 3

Goal:

Avoid all Radar Red circles, fly over all 3 Yellow Missile Sites, and fly over the Green Escape circle to win.

Controls:

W to speed up

S to slow down

A and D to turn
